Text: Damn. What can i open them with?

Go to 


http://www.cdisplay.me/


to get the program to open them with.

You can open the first issue by going here and downloading adobe digital editions:




http://www.adobe.com/products/digital-editions.html



Both programs are free.

Thanks for the upload! These look awesome :) 

@bendyrulz the .epub file can be read on a nook, iPhone, Android, or a number of programs like the one Kanano recommended. To open .cbr files without downloading a new program, just change the extension to .rar and unzip the compressed folder.
